## Formalizing dynamics{.smaller}


-   Deterministic equation:

```{=tex}
\begin{equation} \label{eq:2}
\frac{dS_i}{dt} = S_i(1-S_i)(\beta_i + \alpha_{ii}S_i + \sum_{i \neq j}\alpha_{ij}S_j(1 + \delta_i f(S_i)))
\end{equation}
```
-   Add (white) noise:

```{=tex}
\begin{equation} \label{eq:3}
dS_{it} = S_{it}(1-S_{it})(\beta_i + \alpha_{ii} S_{it} + \sum_{i \neq j}\alpha_{ij}S_{jt}(1+\delta_i f(S_{it})) dt + S_{it}dW_t
\end{equation}
```
